item.title: Samsung Galaxy S8
item.description: Processor: Exynos 8895 Octa-core (4x2.3 GHz & 4x1.7 GHz) RAM: 4GB Storage: 64GB GPU: Mali-G71 MP20 OS: Android 7.0 (Nougat) Camera: Primary 12MP (2016p video), Secondary 8MP Display: Super AMOLED (Corning Gorilla Glass 5) Resolution: 1440 x 2960 pixels Battery: 3000mAh Battery: 148.9 x 68.1 x 8 mm (5.86 x 2.68 x 0.31 in)

item.title: Apple Iphone X 256GB
item.description: Processor: Apple A11 Bionic Hexa-core 2.39 GHz (2x Monsoon + 4x Mistral) RAM: 3GB Storage: 256GB GPU: Apple GPU (three-core graphics) OS: iOS 11.1.1 Camera: Primary 12MP (2016p video), Secondary 7MP Display: Super AMOLED (Scratch-resistant glass, oleophobic coating) Resolution: 1125 x 2436 pixels pixels Battery: 2716mAh Battery: 143.6 x 70.9 x 7.7 mm (5.65 x 2.79 x 0.30 in)

item.title: Nokia Lumia 950 XL
item.description: Processor: Qualcomm MSM8994 Snapdragon 810 Octa-core RAM: 3GB Storage: 32GB GPU: Adreno 430 OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Camera: Primary 20MP (2016p video), Secondary 5MP Display: AMOLED (Corning Gorilla Glass 4) Resolution: 1440 x 2560 pixels Battery: 3300mAh Battery: 151.9 x 78.4 x 8.1 mm (5.98 x 3.09 x 0.32 in)

item.title: Huawei MATE 10 Pro
item.description: Processor: Hisilicon Kirin 970 Octa-core RAM: 6GB Storage: 128GB GPU: Mali-G71 MP12 OS: Android 8.0 (Oreo) Camera: Primary Dual 12MP+20MP (2016p video), Secondary 8MP Display: AMOLED (Corning Gorilla Glass) Resolution: 1080 x 2160 pixels Battery: 4000mAh Battery: 154.2 x 74.5 x 7.9 mm (6.07 x 2.93 x 0.31 in)
